body_html: In general, I would recommend using the high-level APIs, which have made this sort of task easier. In this case, it's a little hard to advise, because it's not exactly clear to me what about your approach isn't working-- can you provide the code and error message you are getting? In theory, as long as you build your dataset ops in the inference graph, separate from the training graph, you should be fine, if I understand your use-case correctly.
